title: Baidees Salon premium multi-page website with booking, services, gallery, and luxury styling

requirements.text: Create a mobile-first, multi-page website for the unisex salon brand “Baidees Salon” with these routes/pages: Home, Services, Gallery, About Us, and Contact & Booking. Ensure navigation allows moving between all pages.

quotes: Create a modern, premium, mobile-first website for a unisex salon brand named “Baidees Salon”.

Pages & Sections

1. Home Page ...

2. Services Page ...

3. Gallery Page ...

4. About Us ...

5. Contact & Booking ...

acceptanceCriteria: All 5 pages are accessible via the app navigation without dead links.
Routes render correctly on mobile and desktop viewports.
Page titles/headers and body copy are in English and match the provided sections.

requirements.text: Implement the global design system across all pages to match the brand vibe (luxurious but welcoming, stylish, clean, minimal, trustworthy) using a black + gold + white palette, elegant serif headings with modern sans-serif body text, rounded cards, soft shadows, and subtle glassmorphism accents.

quotes: Brand vibe: luxurious but welcoming, stylish, clean, minimal, trustworthy.

Design Requirements

Color palette: black + gold + white luxury theme

Elegant serif headings + modern sans-serif body font

Rounded cards, soft shadows, glassmorphism accents

acceptanceCriteria: All pages share a consistent palette, typography system, and component styling.
Cards and sections visibly use rounded corners, soft shadowing, and glass-like translucent accents where appropriate.
Contrast and readability are acceptable for body text on the chosen background colors.

requirements.text: Add a sticky navigation bar present on all pages with links to Home, Services, Gallery, About, and Contact/Booking, and include prominent CTAs (Book Appointment, Call Now) where appropriate for conversion.

quotes: Sticky navigation bar
CTA buttons: Book Appointment and Call Now

acceptanceCriteria: Navbar remains visible while scrolling on mobile and desktop.
Navbar links navigate to the correct page/route.
Book Appointment and Call Now CTAs are discoverable on the site (at minimum on Home and/or Contact/Booking).

requirements.text: Build the Home page sections: (1) full-width hero with a stylish salon interior background and tagline “Where Style Meets Confidence”, (2) short intro about Baidees Salon, (3) highlight service cards for Hair Cutting & Styling, Hair Spa & Treatments, Hair Keratin & Smoothening, Beard Grooming, Facial & Skin Care, (4) before/after gallery slider, (5) customer testimonials, (6) CTA buttons: Book Appointment and Call Now.

quotes:
1. Home Page

Full-width hero section with a stylish salon interior background

Tagline: “Where Style Meets Confidence”

Short intro about Baidees Salon

Highlight services cards:

Hair Cutting & Styling

Hair Spa & Treatments

Hair Keratin & Smoothening

Beard Grooming

Facial & Skin Care


Before/After gallery slider

Customer testimonials

CTA buttons: Book Appointment and Call Now

acceptanceCriteria: Hero renders full-width with the specified tagline.
Five service highlight cards render with the exact service names provided.
Before/after slider allows switching between at least 2 before/after examples.
Testimonials section displays at least 3 testimonials (placeholder content acceptable).
Book Appointment CTA navigates to the Contact & Booking page; Call Now CTA is a clickable tel: link.

requirements.text: Build the Services page with categorized service lists and pricing placeholders for: Hair Services (Haircut (Men/Women/Kids), Hair Styling, Hair Coloring, Beard Styling), Hair Treatments (Hair Spa, Keratin Treatment, Smoothening, Rebonding, Anti-Dandruff Treatment, Hair Fall Treatment), Skin & Grooming (Facial, Cleanup, Detan, Head Massage). Each service must include a short benefits description and a duration.

quotes:

Create categorized service lists with pricing placeholders:

Hair Services

Haircut (Men/Women/Kids)

Hair Styling

Hair Coloring

Hair Spa

acceptanceCriteria: All categories and all listed services are present.
Each service row/card shows a price placeholder, a short benefits description, and a duration.
Layout is mobile-first with an easy-to-scan structure (cards or accordions acceptable).

requirements.text: Build the Gallery page with (1) a grid gallery combining hairstyle results and salon interior images, (2) a before/after comparison section, and (3) an Instagram-style layout option (e.g., square tiles and tight grid rhythm).

quotes:
3. Gallery Page

Grid gallery of hairstyle results and salon interior

Before/after comparison section

Instagram-style layout

acceptanceCriteria: Gallery shows a responsive grid of at least 9 images (placeholder images acceptable).
A before/after comparison section is present and interactive (slider or toggle).
Grid uses an Instagram-like tile layout on mobile (square tiles, consistent gutters).

requirements.text: Build the About Us page including: story of Baidees Salon, professional stylists introduction, hygiene & premium product assurance, and a “Why choose us” bullet list.

quotes:
4. About Us

Story of Baidees Salon

Professional stylists introduction

Hygiene & premium product assurance

Why choose us (bullet points)

acceptanceCriteria: Page includes all four requested sections with clear headings and readable copy.
Stylists section shows at least 2 stylist profiles (placeholder names/photos acceptable).
“Why choose us” is presented as a bullet list.

requirements.text: Build the Contact & Booking page including: an online appointment booking form (name, phone, service, date, time), a WhatsApp booking button, a Google Maps location placeholder section, and an opening hours section.

quotes:
5. Contact & Booking

Online appointment booking form (name, phone, service, date, time)

WhatsApp booking button

Google Maps location placeholder

Opening hours section

acceptanceCriteria: Form includes required fields: name, phone, service, date, time.
Submitting the form shows a success state and clears or resets the form.
WhatsApp booking button uses a wa.me or whatsapp:// link (with placeholder number if none provided).
A Maps placeholder block is shown (no real map integration required).
Opening hours are displayed in a clear list/table format.

requirements.text: Implement backend support for appointment submissions: store appointment records (name, phone, service, date, time, createdAt) and expose a canister method to create an appointment from the frontend. Validate required fields and return a confirmation (e.g., appointment id).

quotes: Online appointment booking form (name, phone, service, date, time)

acceptanceCriteria: Backend provides a create-appointment method callable from the frontend actor.
Required field validation rejects missing/empty name, phone, service, date, or time.
Successful submissions are stored in stable state for the canister lifetime and return a confirmation value.

requirements.text: Add smooth scroll animations and hover effects throughout the UI (e.g., section reveal, card hover lift, button hover transitions) while keeping performance acceptable on mobile devices.

quotes: Smooth scroll animations and hover effects
Mobile responsive first

acceptanceCriteria: Interactive elements (buttons, cards, nav links) have visible hover/focus states.
Scrolling through Home/Services/Gallery shows subtle entrance/reveal animations without jank on mobile.
Animations respect accessibility considerations (do not block interaction; prefer reduced motion where feasible).

requirements.text: Add an offer banner feature (e.g., “Flat 20% off on Keratin Treatment”) displayed prominently (at least on Home page, and optionally site-wide).

quotes: Offer banner (e.g., “Flat 20% off on Keratin Treatment”)

acceptanceCriteria: Offer banner is visible without requiring navigation to a hidden page.
Banner content matches the example offer text or uses a clearly marked placeholder offer in English.
Banner styling matches the luxury theme and remains readable on mobile.

requirements.text: Add a membership/loyalty card section describing a premium membership (benefits and how it works) with a visually distinct card-style layout consistent with the black/gold/white theme.

quotes: Membership/loyalty card section

acceptanceCriteria: Membership section is present (Home or a dedicated section on another page is acceptable).
Section includes at least 3 benefits items and a clear call-to-action (e.g., “Ask at reception” or “Contact us” placeholder).
Membership content is presented using a card-like visual treatment (rounded, premium accents).

requirements.text: Add an FAQ section about treatments and hair care with at least 6 Q&A items, using an accordion interaction pattern suitable for mobile.

quotes: FAQ section about treatments and hair care

acceptanceCriteria: FAQ shows at least 6 questions with expandable answers.
Accordion interaction works via click/tap on mobile.
FAQ content is written in English and matches salon/treatment topics.

requirements.text: Create a site-wide footer with social media links (placeholders acceptable), contact cues, and consistent branding styling.

quotes: Footer with social media links

acceptanceCriteria: Footer appears on all pages.
Footer includes at least 3 social links (placeholders allowed).
Footer styling is consistent with the black/gold/white theme and remains readable on mobile.

requirements.text: Add required static image assets for the hero, gallery, before/after examples, and stylist imagery, and render them from frontend static assets (not via backend).

quotes: Full-width hero section with a stylish salon interior background
Grid gallery of hairstyle results and salon interior
Before/After gallery slider
Professional stylists introduction

acceptanceCriteria: All required images are committed as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated.
UI components reference these local assets and render without broken links.
Gallery/hero/slider/stylist sections display the intended imagery on mobile and desktop.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose these components instead).
Do not edit immutable hook/bootstrap files: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (all logic in backend/main.mo); only add migration.mo if an upgrade requires it.
nonGoals: Do not integrate real Google Maps (use a placeholder section only).
Do not integrate Instagram APIs or live social feeds (static gallery layout only).
Do not implement third-party authentication providers (Internet Identity only, if authentication is needed later).
Do not implement payments or e-commerce features.
